column5: In case you guys didn't catch it on TV - They let our crew on the field to shoot Dave last night!  Happy Tuesday!  Cheers, Ryan  http://www.factsoffishing.com/videos.php?id=38
That's great! lol  ...and they had to add in that famous laugh right at the end of the clip.
Dude is throwin heat..lol.  Great stuff, Dave, for an even better cause!!
If someone had hit one of those, do you thnk they'd have called it a "LINE DRIVE" ???? Badum-bum. Jack.
Well that put a smile on my face this morning!!
clever jack....just plain clever...
Very cool...WTG Dave.  All for a great cause...
Great Job! I think Dave could have wheeled it in there from 90ft away!, too bad about the attendance at the game though, yikes..
great job!!!!
Awesome, thanks for the link.  Joey
Right on Dave... Congrats and thanks Ryan for the link Leechman

Looked to me like he mighta thrown (cast) a strike first pitch. Rare enuf for these ceremonial pitch tossers. But then he got on the catcher about booting it and asked for the ball to cast again, and it looked like another strike. Waytago, Mercer!.  I think the vast majority of folks who get to throw the first pitch are just relieved to get it over with, usually cuz they went in expecting the worst, and got it.  JF
Great footage man, and great cast Dave!
Great Video for a GREAT cause!!!!   Way To Go  Dave!!!!!!    Awesome Stuff!!  :clapping:   RFS
kewl
Thanks for posting this.  I heard he was gonna do it ... not too bad of a pitch/cast either.
lol, thats awesome.. good job Dave!! Looked like a strike to me!
That was great Dave. Nice job...
Check his pockets. Files and nail clippers are classic ball doctorin' tools.  Good job Dave!
That's great!    Think that first one caught the catcher by surprise...dude shoulda had that.  That attendance is sad   though...ya'll (thats for Glen) gotta get out to a least one game a year boys.
